Welcome toOcean Institute

All programs are designed to maximize immersion, spark curiosity, and inspire a deep commitment to learning.

Whale and Marine Life Excursions

Experience our exciting, educational cruises as you encounter fascinating species in their Pacific Ocean habitat. Get up-close-and-personal as you observe sea life from the deck of our R/V Sea Explorer.

Chambers Gallery Gift Shop

The Laurena G. Chambers Gallery Gift Shop carries ocean-themed items and the latest educational products. Proceeds benefit Ocean Institute programs. Visit the store to find a variety of maritime books, puzzles, jewelry, home decor, and apparel.

Calendar

Ocean Institute is open on the weekends from 10am- 3pm. For questions please e-mail guestservices@oceaninstitute.org

Field Trips

At the Ocean Institute, Experience is the Teacher. Our programs range from immersing students in historical reenactments to empowering students to build robots for undersea exploration and everything in-between.

Pricing Update FAQ

Why are prices increasing?

As a nonprofit, the Ocean Institute works hard to keep prices low and accessible for all. Due to rising operational costs such as wages, supplies, and utilities we are implementing modest price increases on select tickets and public programs. This helps us continue offering high-quality educational experiences and maintain our ships, facilities, and staff.

Will all ticket and program prices increase?

No. Not all programs will be affected. Only select tickets and public programs will see modest increases. Many experiences will remain at their current pricing. In fact, some ticket prices will be right-sized to better align with similar offerings, which may result in a slight decrease for certain experiences.

Are membership prices changing?

No. Membership pricing will remain the same at this time. Members will continue to enjoy the same great benefits and discounts.

How can I see what prices are changing?

Updated pricing will be available on our website starting July 1, 2025. If you have questions about a specific program, feel free to ask our Guest Services team or email us at info@oceaninstitute.org.

I already purchased tickets for a program later this year will I have to pay more?

No. All existing reservations and ticket purchases made before July 1 will be honored at the price paid at the time of purchase.

Where does my money go?

Every dollar supports the Ocean Institutes mission to provide ocean education to students, families, and the community. Your support helps maintain our historic ships, care for marine life, offer hands-on learning, and fund field trips for local schools.

I have more questions who can I talk to?

Our Guest Services team is happy to help! Visit us at the front desk, call (949) 496-2274, or email guestservices@oceaninstitute.org.
